entities.description: Information on whether the respondent got marijuana in some other way in the past 12 months.
Time since the respondent last paid for or bought marijuana or cannabis products.
The number of days in the past 30 days the respondent paid for or bought marijuana or cannabis products.
The amount of money paid for the last marijuana purchase in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent got marijuana in some other way in the past 12 months.
Indicates the time since the respondent last paid for or bought marijuana or cannabis products.
Indicates the number of days the respondent paid for or bought marijuana or cannabis products in the past 30 days.
Indicates the amount of money paid by the respondent for the last marijuana purchase in the past 12 months.
